You infuse your handwraps with black powder. On your first melee Strike each round with an unarmed attack, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.dgXjUcaoQDAY6ZpO]{Knuckle Duster}, or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.8eGV6fXbmt2v74uB]{Black Powder Knuckle Dusters}, you deal an additional 1 fire Damage. If you critically succeed at an attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} while in this stance, the target is pushed back an additional 5 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.kDTiRg9vVOYNnTyr]{Stance: Powder Punch Stance}

Practiced Guidance.name: Orientação Prática
Practiced Guidance.description:
Arquétipo Lavrador da Campânula

Pré-requisitos Dedicação da Campânula

Levar outrem até a segurança pode ser assustador, mas você possui muita prática em ajudar os outros ao longo do caminho. Quando rolar um sucesso para Auxiliar um membro da sua colheita, trate o resultado como um sucesso crítico.

Practiced Paddler.name: Remador Praticante
Practiced Paddler.description:
Pré-requisitos remador shoony

Você é bem treinado em navegar por pântanos e brejos, mesmo para um remador shoony. Você ganha velocidade de nado de 4,5 metros.

Prayer Attack.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UuPZ7drPBnSmI8Eo]{Red Mantis Assassin Dedication}

Requirements You are wielding a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wkzxLpSe7LN6c5Ld]{Sawtooth Saber} in each hand.

You’ve mastered the signature assassination style of the Red Mantis. Attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} an enemy within 30 feet. If your Feint is successful, when you use Prayer Attack on subsequent turns you automatically make the target flat-footed against your melee attacks for that turn without rolling a check to Feint, so as long as you remain visible to the target and the target remains within 30 feet of you. If you use your Prayer Attack against a different target, you must attempt to Feint the target normally.

When you use Prayer Attack, your next successful Strike with a sawtooth saber that turn deals 2d6 persistent bleed damage to the target.

Prayer-Touched Weapon.description:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip divine spell.

You coat a weapon you're wielding in prayers and the divine power given to you by your deity. Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an extra [[/r 1d6[positive]]] damage. As usual for positive damage, this damage harms only undead and creatures with negative healing.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.cA6ps8RKE0gysEWr]{Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon}

Precise Finisher.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.pyo0vmxUFIFX2GNl]{Confident Finisher}

Even when your foe avoids your Confident Finisher, you can still hit a vital spot. On a failure with Confident Finisher, you apply your full precise strike damage instead of half.

Predator's Pounce.name: Bote de Predador
Predator's Pounce.description:
Pré-requisitos instinto animal

Requerimentos Você está sem armadura ou vestindo uma armadura leve.

Você encurta a distância para sua presa em um borrão de movimento, atacando a criatura antes dela perceber. Você Anda até sua Velocidade e desfere um Golpe ao final de seu movimento.

Predatory Claws.description:
Your nails grow into sharp claws, perfect for seizing and tearing your prey. You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage. Your claws are in the brawling group and have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits.

If you hit the same enemy with two consecutive claw Strikes in the same round, you can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} that same target as a free action, provided you take that action immediately after the second Strike.

Predictive Purchase (Investigator).description:
You have just the thing for the situation. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Prescient Planner} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lHFz4MmebvPqTb0A]{Prescient Consumable} feats.

When using Prescient Planner, you can pull out the item as a 2-action activity to remove your backpack (or a similar container) and draw the item, rather than taking 1 minute.

Prepare Papers.description: You're practiced at creating forgeries that establish your outlaw credentials or augment your legal authority. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ftG89SjTSa9DYDOD]{Create Forgery} as an exploration activity. It takes you about 1 hour per page of the document that you're forging. This time is reduced to 10 minutes per page if you're legendary in Society.

Pride Hunter.description: You avoid the attention of creatures focused on your allies. You can use lesser cover from your allies to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}.

Protective Spirit Mask.description:
Your mask carries the protective instincts of White Bull, the Horn Forger, and no one will hurt your allies while you have anything to say about it. Immediately after you Cast a non-cantrip Spell that targets only one ally, you can choose to have the spell also give that creature a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.kzSjzK72CQ67wfBH]{Effect: Protective Spirit Mask}

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.KIU5eDZP9VyQIfas]{Protector's Interdiction} reaction.

Provocator Dedication.description:
Access Successfully defeat the eberarks in the Irorium.

For you, fighting is as much about style as skill. You become trained in simple weapons, martial weapons, and one advanced weapon of your choice. When you critically succeed at an attack roll using your chosen advanced weapon, you also apply the critical specialization of that weapon. You become an expert in Performance and your choice of either Acrobatics or Athletics. If you were an expert in all three of these skills, you instead become an expert in a skill of your choice.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.XLug8rxIe1KPX6Nf]{Provocator} archetype.

Psi Strikes.description:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} or to Unleash your Psyche.

You siphon residual psychic energies from your spell into one weapon you're wielding or one of your unarmed attacks and when you unleash your mind, the energies flare to match. The attack deals an extra [[/r 1d6[force]]] damage until the end of the current turn. If your Psyche is Unleashed, this benefit instead lasts until your psyche subsides.

Psychic Dedication.description:
You feel something awaken within your mind. You become trained in Occultism; if you were already trained in Occultism, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You cast spells like a psychic and gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} activity; as you don't have a subconscious mind, your thought components are simple intentions. Choose a conscious mind. You gain a spell repertoire with one standard psi cantrip of your choice from your conscious mind, which you cast as a psi cantrip. You gain the normal benefits and the amp for this psi cantrip, but not any other benefits from the conscious mind. If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can use to amp your psi cantrips, and you can Refocus by meditating on your new powers. If you already have a focus pool, increase the number of points in your pool by 1. You're trained in occult spell attack rolls and occult spell DCs. Your key spellcasting ability for psychic archetype spells is the ability you used to qualify for the archetype, and they are occult psychic spells.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.ygzv72IJNmjh0SPB]{Psychic} archetype.

Psychic Rapport.description:
Your telepathic sensitivity intensifies when you're affected by mental magic, making it easier for you to link to other creatures. After you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} with the mental trait, until the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Dbr5hInQXH904Ca7]{Effect: Psychic Rapport}

Psychopomp Familiar.description:
Your familiar becomes a masked psychopomp-an extraplanar guardian of the cycle of souls. This familiar continues to use all the same rules as other familiars, but one of its abilities must always be speech and it has the monitor and psychopomp traits. As normal when a familiar must always have a certain ability, the speech ability counts against your familiar's abilities each day.

You can select three familiar or master abilities each day, instead of two, but one must be one of the following psychopomp familiar abilities.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.o0fxDDUu2ZSWYDTr]{Soul Sight} Your familiar gains lifesense with a range of 30 feet.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.nrPl3Dz7fbnmas7T]{Spirit Touch} Your familiar can touch incorporeal creatures. If you have the spell delivery master ability from your familiar, any spell the familiar delivers with it gains the benefits of the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune.

Push Back the Dead!.description:
You call to your ally and strengthen their resolve and abilities to defend against the horrific tricks undead bring to bear. The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead. It also gains resistance to damage from Strikes made by undead creatures equal to half your Charisma modifier.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.OeZ0E1oUKyGPxPy0]{Effect: Push Back the Dead!}

Quaking Stomp.name: Pisão do Tremor
Quaking Stomp.description:
Frequência uma vez a cada 10 minutos

Você pisa no chão com tanta força que cria um pequeno terremoto (com os efeitos da magia terremoto).

Quick Fix.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1t5479E6bdvFs4E7]{Talisman Dabbler Dedication}

You can attach a talisman using only a bit of glue and some string. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x9xA8P2Vlz98He7C]{Rapid Affixture} skill feat, even if you don’t meet the prerequisites. When you use it, you can affix or remove up to four talismans in 1 minute instead of just one.

You gain the ability to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{Affix a Talisman} as a 3-action activity from that feat at 12th level, regardless of your Crafting proficiency.

Quick Juggler.name: Malabarista Rápido
Quick Juggler.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.8vuL2hCPrcG2duLt]{Malabarista} Prerequisites especialista em Performance, Dedicação de Malabarista

Quando você começa a fazer malabares e adiciona outro item ao seu número, você adiciona dois itens ao invés de um, Aumente o número máximo de itens que você pode fazer malabares em um.

(Tradução Livre de AP 151: The Show Must Go On)

Quick Mount.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5Q69PI8jdQVkb1ZT]{Cavalier Dedication}, expert in Nature

Requirements You are adjacent to a creature that is at least one size larger than you and is willing to be your mount.

You and your mount can spring into action at a moment’s notice. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PM5jvValFkbFH3TV]{Mount} the creature and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} to issue it an order of your choice.

Quicken Heartbeat.name: Acelerar Batimento Cardíaco
Quicken Heartbeat.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XATPzPTZ9Je89erT]{Golem Enxertado} Frequência uma vez por turno Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Golem Enxertado

Você substituiu seu coração por feito de mercúrio e adamante vivo. Você reduz sua condição de your @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lento} por 1. Alternativamente, se você não estiver lento, você fica @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Acelerado} 1 durante seu próximo turno, você pode usar sua ação extra para andar ou golpear.

Rapid Affixture.description:
Prerequisites master in Crafting

You take only 1 minute to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{Affix a Talisman}. If you’re legendary in Crafting, you can Affix a Talisman as a 3-action activity.

Rat Familiar.description: You have a pet rat that has become magically bonded to you. You gain a familiar using the rules on page 217 of the Core Rulebook, and this familiar must be a rat. It still gets the benefits of familiar abilities, but its base form remains a rat.

Rat Magic.description: There always seems to be a little rat around to carry messages for you. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yhz9fF69uwRhnHix]{Animal Messenger} once per day as a primal innate spell. When you do, the animal that responds is always a rat. If there are no rats within range, the spell is lost.

Ravening's Desperation.name: Desespero de Ravening
Ravening's Desperation.description:
Pré-requisitos treinado em Saber de Zevgavizeb

Seu estudo da Fera de Glutãosombrio lhe ensinou como ter sucesso nas mais árduas circunstancias ao invés de sucumbir à fraqueza. Enquanto seus Pontos de Vida atuais forem menos que o seus Pontos de Vida máximos, você ganha um bonus de circunstancia +1 para testes de Sobrevivência e Furtividade. Se os seus Pontos de Vida atuais forem um quarto do valor máximo, o bônus circunstancial é +2.;

Ravenous Charge.description: Hungry for the flesh of the living, you hurl yourself into the fray, teeth gnashing. You Stride. If you end your movement within melee reach of a living creature, you can make an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} that creature. If you succeed, you then make a jaws Strike against that creature.

Read Psychometric Resonance.description: With a touch, you can read the psychic impressions left on objects by their previous owners. This exploration activity functions similarly to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} in that you move at half your travel speed or slower while looking for psychometric resonance. You must brush your bare hands over any objects you pass while you do this. This detects objects with significant emotional resonance attached to them, such as the joy from a child's beloved teddy bear, the sorrow from a widower's wedding ring, or the fear from a victim's murder weapon. If you're looking for a particular type of emotional resonance, you can choose to ignore other emotions. If you find an item with that resonance, you can explore that resonance with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.jZQoAHmGJvi53NRR]{Psychometric Assessment} action.

Read Shibboleths.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.u6SDVWbzHnBBPNMo]{Linguist Dedication}, master in Society

All communication is filled with slight tells and signals. If you interact with someone for at least 10 minutes, their regional words, pronunciation changes, and nonverbal cues provide you with a minor fact about their social environment, such as their hometown or certain groups they might belong to.

If a target of this ability is being deceptive about their social environment, such as a commoner pretending to be a noble, they must attempt a Deception, Society, or appropriate Lore check against your Society DC, providing you a false minor fact consistent with their assumed identity on a success.

Once you’ve gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them.

Reanimating Spark.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You have the dying condition and are about to attempt a recovery check.

The magic that animates you strains to keep you alive. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the wounded condition as normal when losing the dying condition in this way.

Reanimator Dedication.description:
You have dedicated your studies to the art of raising and commanding undead. If you're a spontaneous spellcaster with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Animate Dead} in your repertoire, it becomes a signature spell in addition to your usual signature spells. If you're a prepared spellcaster with animate dead in your spells known, spellbook, or the like, you can spend 10 minutes contemplating undeath to replace one of the spells you've prepared in your spell slots with an animate dead spell of the same level. In addition, if you're able to target the mostly intact remains of an appropriate type of dead creature when casting animate dead, the undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of animate dead.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.EQCnu8DGHDDNXch0]{Effect: Reanimator Dedication}

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.ePfibeHcnRcjO6lC]{Reanimator} archetype.

Reason Rapidly.description: Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed. You instantly use up to five Recall Knowledge actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can’t use them for these actions.

Reassuring Presence.description:
Trigger An ally within 30 feet gains the frightened condition.

You serve as an anchor to your close companions, calming them in times of stress. Decrease the value of the triggering ally's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition by 1. The ally is then temporarily immune to your Reassuring Presence for 1 hour.

Reclaim Spell.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.a1TSGGsA6b5gjP3H]{Reprepare Spell}

You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections. You reclaim the magic of an ongoing spell, using it reprepare a spell with a duration. You Dismiss a Spell of 4th level or lower that you cast today from a spell slot with at least half its duration remaining, even if that spell can’t normally be Dismissed. You can then spend 10 minutes to reprepare the spell in that spell slot, as Reprepare Spell.

Reclaimant Plea.description:
You call on the power of the Crimson Oath to gain magical aid. Choose one of the following spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{Air Walk}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ksLCg62cLOojw3gN]{Dimensional Anchor}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.DyiD239dNS7RIxZE]{Searing Light}. You can Cast that Spell once per day as a 4th-level divine innate spell. At 14th level, the spell heightens to 5th level, and at 16th level, the spell heightens to 6th level. If you anger the mysterious source of the Crimson Oath's power, you lose the ability to cast the spell until you atone.

Special You can select this feat a second time at 14th level, gaining a second spell from the list above, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.E3X2RbzWHCdz7gsk]{Flame Strike}, which you can cast once per day; you also become an expert in divine spell DCs and divine spell attack rolls. You can select this feat a third time at 18th level, gaining either a third spell from the list above, death ward, flame strike, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]{Sunburst}, which you can cast once per day; additionally, all three spells from this feat heighten to 7th level, and you become a master of divine spell attacks and spell DCs.

Red Mantis Assassin Dedication.name: Dedicação de Assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho

Reflect Foe.description: You create a copy of a foe by calling them forth from a nearby reflection, clonally growing them in an instant from one of your hairs or otherwise creating them in a way that matches your own nature as a reflection. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.73rToy0v5Ra9NvL6]{Duplicate Foe} once per day as an innate occult spell. At 20th level, your innate duplicate foe is heightened to 8th level.

Reflecting Riposte.description:
Prerequisites Dueling Riposte, Mirror Shield, or Twin Riposte

Trigger An opponent casts a spell and you critically succeed at a saving throw against it.

Requirements You have a shield raised or are benefiting from Dueling Parry or Twin Parry.

You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts. Use your attack roll modifier with your shield or parrying weapon for your counteract check. If you counteract the spell, it is reflected upon the caster. If the spell targeted individual creatures, it targets the caster only. If the spell targeted an area centered on a point, the new area is centered on the caster. If the spell was a cone or line, the cone or line emanates from you toward the caster. If the spell has a save DC, it uses your class DC, and if it requires a spell attack roll, use the same attack roll modifier as the counteract check.

Reflective Pocket.description: You've formed a connection with a small hand mirror, allowing you to use it as an extradimensional storage space. You can store one item of light Bulk in your mirror at a time. Storing or retrieving an item requires an Interact action and any creature can do so. While an item is stored within the mirror, the mirror reflects the item's image. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.qVNVSmsgpKFGk9hV]{Conceal the Object} unless someone checks the mirror's reflection.

Reflexive Catch.name: Aparada Reflexiva
Reflexive Catch.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.8vuL2hCPrcG2duLt]{Malabarista}
Pré-requisitosespecialista em Acrobatismo, Dedicação de Malabarista
Requerimentos O Item ou arma arremessada é de um volume que você possa fazer malabares. Se o Acionamento foi o ataque de uma arma de arremesso tendo você como alvo, você não pode estar desprevenido contra o ataque. Se você já estava fazendo malabares, você não pode adicioná-lo ao seu número máximo de itens.
AcionamentoUm item cai dentro do seu alcance ou um atacante falha em uma rolagem de ataque com arma de arremesso contra você ou uma criatura ao seu alcance.

Você pega o item acionador. Se você estiver fazendo malabares, você pode imediatamente adicionar o objeto aos do seu número com uma ação livre, que tem os traços concentração e manuseio .

Reflexive Riposte.description:
Prerequisites Opportune Riposte

You can riposte almost without a thought. At the start of each of your turns when you regain your actions, you gain an additional reaction that can be used only to perform an Opportune Riposte.

Reflexive Stance.description:
Acionamento Você rola iniciativa.

Você reage a um perigo iminente entrando em uma postura sem sequer pensar. Use uma ação que tenha o traço postura.

Rejuvenation Token.description:
You tie yourself to the Material Plane by implanting a piece of your consciousness into a weapon, piece of armor, or other item that's precious to you. As long as this object is intact, even if your body is destroyed, you can be restored to the exact state you were in the last time you made daily preparations with this object in your possession. The soulbound object can be used as a special focus for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]{Resurrect}, or similar magic. This warps the spell to bring you back in your skeletal undead state rather than bringing you back to life. Pharasma can't prevent you from returning when the spell is modified in this way.

When you return, you permanently lose a memory that was precious to you, in addition to any other side effects of the spell that brought you back. Your soulbound object becomes inert until you spend 1 week of downtime to anchor yourself to it again, further fragmenting your mind.

Reloading Trick.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements You're holding an unloaded hand crossbow.

You can fire off a single shot even when unprepared. You Interact to reload your hand crossbow and Strike with it.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.HvPvyeXM2iMK4OYf]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Training} feat, you can use this feat with a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zcrIuILnp6oh4dr9]{Repeating Hand Crossbow} to load either a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AITVZmakiu3RgfKo]{Bolt} or a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.xk9bw9ccupAIx7xT]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Magazine}, but the speed means you can fire only one bolt, then the magazine jams. You must spend a 3-action Interact activity to remove the jammed magazine and clear it before it can be used again.

Remote Trigger.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4MUbwilvb9dI0X59]{Snarecrafter Dedication}

You’ve learned how to trigger snares from afar, creating ranged hazards to assail your opponents and allowing you to disarm enemies’ snares harmlessly.

You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} a snare to trigger it prematurely. If you crafted the snare, you automatically hit. If someone else crafted it, attempt a ranged Strike against the Crafting DC, triggering the snare only if you hit.

Remove Presence.description:
Your spell reaches into the mind of a creature and removes you from it. The amped cantrip must be one that has one or more targets and must either require a spell attack roll or have a saving throw. Use this amp in place of the psi cantrip's normal amp entry.

Amp Choose one target of the spell or one creature in its area. If that enemy fails its save or the spell hits it, you become undetected by that creature, disappearing from its senses for 1 minute or until you use a hostile action. This is similar to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, but effects like see invisibility don't reveal you-you're affecting the target's mind, not its vision. True seeing can still see through this illusion if the counteract check succeeds.

Renewing Quills.description: Your spines grow back much faster than other shisks. You can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills} reaction once every 10 minutes.

Repeating Hand Crossbow Training.description:
You become trained in the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zcrIuILnp6oh4dr9]{Repeating Hand Crossbow} and gain access to repeating hand crossbows and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.oJZe5rRitvioUgRh]{Shootist Bandolier}. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the repeating hand crossbow. If you're at least an expert in a repeating hand crossbow you're using, you gain access to its critical specialization effect. You can perform the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Bh1Qnh8JP4CMysRK]{Shootist's Draw} action with repeating hand crossbows.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.meQJfsKVar9tm6c9]{Running Reload} feat, you can reload a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.xk9bw9ccupAIx7xT]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Magazine} on the move. You can use Running Reload as a 3-action activity to reload a magazine into a repeating hand crossbow after you Stride, Step, or Sneak, or as a 2-action activity if you use a magazine from a shootist bandolier.

Replicate.name: Replicate
Replicate.description: You've learned to reshape your malleable form. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} once per day as an innate occult spell. This is a transmutation and morph effect, as your body physically transforms, rather than an illusion effect.

Reptile Speaker.name: Falar com Répteis
Reptile Speaker.description: Você interpreta o som de répteis com uma lingua. Você pode fazer perguntas, obter respostas, e usar a perícia Diplomacia com animais que sejam répteis (O MJ determina que animais contam como répteis).

Repulse the Wicked.description:
Trigger An undead within your reach critically fails an attack roll targeting you.

You use your foe's failure as an opening to push them away. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the undead.

Resounding Blow.description:
Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

You strike your enemy in the head with such force that their ears ring. Make a melee Strike. If the Strike hits and deals damage, the target is Deafened until the start of your next turn (or for 1 minute on a critical hit).

Resourceful Ritualist.description:
Prerequisites Ritualist Dedication

You can cast difficult rituals that might otherwise be just beyond your skill. You can attempt checks to cast a ritual that requires expert proficiency if you are trained, master proficiency if you are an expert, or legendary proficiency if you are a master.

Restitch.description: You've learned how to sew even the most terrible tears and wounds together. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate} as a 7th-level arcane innate spell once per day.

Ricocheting Leap.description: You quickly use your momentum to topple and spring off of foes. You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.X8iSUF1m0eezmrjs]{Wall Jump} to make additional jumps off of creatures larger than you as if they were walls. Once per turn when you make an additional jump off of a creature in this way, you can also attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} that creature as a free action.

Ringmaster's Introduction.description:
Requirements The ally hasn't acted in the current combat.

Trigger An ally's turn begins.

You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} this turn and can spend the extra action to Stride, Strike, Demoralize, Feint, or Perform.

Riptide.description:
Requirements You are within 10 feet of water at least 10 feet deep, and your Speed is sufficient to reach the water in one Stride.

Trigger You successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a creature of the same size as you or smaller.

You Stride up to 10 feet to enter the water, bringing the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} creature with you into the water.

Risky Surgery.name: Cirurgia Arriscada
Risky Surgery.description:
Prerequisites trained in Medicine

Your surgery can bring a patient back from the brink of death, but might push them over the edge. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}, you can deal [[/r 1d8 #slashing]] slashing damage to your patient just before applying the effects of Treat Wounds.

If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Medicine check to Treat Wounds, and if you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Root to Life.description:
Marigold, spider lily, pennyroyal-many primal traditions connect flowers and plants with the boundary between life and death, and you can leverage this association to keep an ally on this side of the line. You place a small plant or similar symbol on an adjacent @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} creature, immediately stabilizing them; the creature is no longer dying and is instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} at 0 Hit Points.

If you spend 2 actions instead of 1, you empower the act further by uttering a quick folk blessing to chase away ongoing pain, adding the auditory trait to the action. When you do so, attempt flat checks to remove each source of persistent damage affecting the target; due to the particularly effective assistance, the DC is 10 instead of the usual 15.

Rule of Three.description:
Requirements You have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.hPZQ5vA9QHEPtjFW]{Spun a Tale}.

Trigger The villain of the tale you've spun makes an attack roll with a given weapon or unarmed attack, uses a particular special ability (such as a Breath Weapon), or Casts a Spell against the hero, and they used that same attack, special ability, or spell against the hero on the previous turn.

Heroes learn from their previous failures, often succeeding on the third attempt. You narrate a tale of the hero's success, granting them a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC or saving throw against the triggering effect. If the villain has used the same effect against the hero on both of their last two turns, and you used Rule of Three on that effect last turn as well, the bonus increases to +4.

Runtsage.description: Unlike most of your kind, who dismiss goblins as embarrassments or expendable annoyances, you have studied the methodology behind their irresponsible and incomprehensible actions. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ihN8gkHSdPG9Trte]{Adopted Ancestry} general feat and must select goblin as the feat's chosen ancestry. You also gain one 1st-level goblin ancestry feat.

Saber Teeth.description: You have long fangs, natural or augmented. You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals [[/r 1d6[piercing]]] damage. Your jaws are in the brawling group and have the unarmed trait.

Sacral Lord.description:
By right of ritual or sheer stubbornness, you have claimed rulership of the land. Claim a defined territory, such as a small section of forest or river, or a district of a larger city. Within its borders, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.AUctDF2fqPZN2w4W]{Sigil} as innate divine cantrips, and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on creatures that have the celestial, fiend, fey, monitor, or spirit traits.

Special You and your land are linked. Changes to one mirror themselves on the other-if you're depressed, gray rain and clammy mist might set in. These effects have no immediate mechanical impact, but they might give clues about problems afflicting the land.

Sacral Monarch.description: You have come into your full powers and are truly a monarch of your realm, by your own definition at least. While in your territory, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{Banishment} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8THDHP0UC7SgOYYF]{Inevitable Disaster} as innate divine spells, each once per day.

Sacred Spells.description:
Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{Chill Touch}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{Disrupt Undead}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2iQKhCQBijhj5Rf3]{Disrupting Weapons}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.DZ9bzXYqMjAK9TzC]{Holy Cascade}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9u6X9ykhzG11NK1n]{Magic Stone}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]{Sunburst} to your spell list. These are all necromancy spells for you, even if they normally have a different spell school. You can either prepare these spells or add them to your repertoire just like the spells normally on your tradition's spell list. When you gain this feat, you can retrain existing spells to replace them with ones on this list.

In addition, your knowledge of the conduits to the Positive Energy Plane allows you more flexibility with these spells. Choose one of these two benefits.

  • If you're a prepared spellcaster, you can spend 10 minutes to replace one of the spells you've prepared with a spell of the same level from the list of sacred spells. You can do this while Refocusing.
  • If you're a spontaneous spellcaster with the signature spells class feature, add two of the spells from the list of sacred spells to your repertoire. They are signature spells for you, in addition to your normal signature spells. When you gain the ability to cast a new level of spells, you can choose to switch the spells from this feat to any other spells from the list.

Safeguard Soul.description:
You've girded your soul against outside interference. You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects, possession effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul. You can't be transformed into an undead by any means. While your spiral is glowing, your allies in the light of the spiral gain this benefit as well.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.tlft5vzk66iWCVRq]{Effect: Safeguard Soul}

Scalpel's Point.description: Your stratagems benefit from your precise knowledge of anatomy. When you critically hit with an attack on which you substituted your attack roll due to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.m0f2B7G9eaaTmhFL]{Devising a Strategem}, if your attack dealt piercing or slashing damage, you also deal [[/r 1d6[bleed]]] to your target.

Scamper Underfoot.name: Passar por Baixo dos Pés
Scamper Underfoot.description: Você está acostumado a passar por debaixo de inimigos no campo de batalha com facilidade. Você ganha um bonus circunstancial de +1 em Acrobatismo em testes para @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Atravessar Acrobaticamente} o espaço de inimigos de tamanho médios ou maiores, e a presença do inimigo não torna os quadrados terreno difícil.

Scarecrow.name: Espantalho
Scarecrow.description:
Arquétipo Lavrador da Campânula

Pré-requisitos Dedicação da Campânula

Você luta ferozmente para proteger sua colheita. Quando atingir uma criatura que estiver adjacente a dois ou mais membros de sua colheita com uma arma ou ataque desarmado, você recebe um bônus de circunstância na sua rolagem de dano igual à quantidade de dados de dano da arma. Quando atingir uma criatura que possuir um membro da sua colheita agarrado, esse membro pode tentar Escapar usando uma reação

Scholastic Identification.description:
Prerequisites Archaeologist Dedication, master in Society

You have the knowledge needed to understand ancient texts and cultural artifacts.

You can use Society when Deciphering Writing, no matter the type of writing you are examining.

You can also use Society to Identify Magic when examining a magic item or location with cultural significance.

Scout's Pounce.description:
Requirements You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by all of your opponents, and you aren't within 10 feet of any enemy.

You leap from the shadows to strike your foes. Stride up to your Speed, then Strike twice. If you were hidden or unnoticed by the target of these Strikes, your foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against both attacks.

Your multiple attack penalty applies normally for both attacks.

Scroll Esoterica.description:
Your esoterica includes scraps of scriptures, magic tomes, druidic markings, and the like, which you can use to create temporary scrolls. Each day during your daily preparations, you can create a single temporary scroll containing a 1st-level spell of any tradition. The spell must be common, or you must otherwise have access to it. This scroll is an unstable, temporary item and loses its magic the next time you make your daily preparations if you haven't used it by then. It can't be used to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Q5iIYCFdqJFM31GW]{Learn the Spell}.

At 8th level, add a second temporary scroll containing a 2nd-level spell.

Second Blessing.description:
Pré-requisitos aliado divino

Sua graça interior atrai a atenção de um segundo espírito protetor. Escolha um segundo tipo de aliado divino e receba seus benefícios.

Secret Eyes.description: You can call forth an invisible eye to let you peek on secrets. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ek5XI0aEdZhBgm21]{Prying Eye} as an innate occult spell.

Secret Speech.name: Código Secreto
Secret Speech.description:
Pré-requisitos treinado em Dissimulação

Escolha uma sociedade secreta (como a Lacunafex ou a Rede da Campânula). Você aprendeu o jargão ou gírias secretas dessa sociedade, capacitando-o a transmitir e receber mensagens secretas ao cantar ou conversar com outros que também o aprenderam. Quando você fizer isso, um observador que obtiver sucesso em um teste de Percepção contra sua CD de Dissimulação percebe que você está passando uma mensagem (mas só consegue discernir seu conteúdo se obtiver sucesso em um teste subsequente de Sociedade contra sua CD de Dissimulação). Em um sucesso crítico, ele descobre não apenas a mensagem, mas também para quem você a está passando.

Especial Você pode selecionar este talento várias vezes. Cada vez que o fizer, você descobre o código secreto de uma sociedade diferente

Seeker of Truths.description:
Your devotion to discovering and hoarding abstruse truths borders on the fanatical, and you can bring this devotion to bear. You gain the cleric's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{Domain Initiate} feat but must select knowledge, secrecy, or truth as your domain. You cast that domain's domain spell as a focus spell of the same tradition as your cantrip from Eldritch Researcher Dedication, and you Refocus by contemplating abstruse mysteries rather than praying to a god. When an ability would manifest a divine symbol—such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aF7RiG7c8GzSQLYt]{Word of Truth} focus spell—it instead manifests as a strange shape unique to you that seems to defy geometry.

Special You can take this feat up to three times, selecting a different domain each time.

Seize.description:
Requirements Your last action was a successful fist Strike against a creature no more than one size larger than you.

You seize your foe and pull it close. The foe you hit is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} as if you succeeded at an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the foe.

Semblance of Life.description:
Trigger You deal damage to a living creature with your fist Strike or with Desiccating Inhalation.

You draw the moisture you've drained from others into your own flesh, temporarily taking on the appearance of life. This has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}, except you can appear only as yourself while you were a living humanoid.

Settlement Scholastics.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PRKe5rWYZMZgEpFU]{Archaeologist Dedication}

Your studies open up new horizons. You become an expert in a Lore skill about a specific settlement; if you were already trained in that Lore skill, you also become trained in the Lore skill for a different settlement of your choice. Choose a single common or uncommon language prevalent in that settlement. You learn that language.

Special You can take this feat multiple times. When you take this feat again, choose a different settlement.

Shadow Mark.description:
Prerequisites expert in Stealth

You have learned special tricks that help you follow individuals without them noticing you.

When you attempt a Stealth check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{Avoid Notice} while following a specific target, the target takes a –2 circumstance penalty to their Perception DC. If you have master proficiency in Stealth, the penalty is –3 or –4 if you’re legendary.

If you start an encounter with the target while shadowing them, the target takes this penalty to their initiative roll and to their Perception DC to determine if they notice you, as normal for @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.

Shared Dream.description: You've learned to create a shared dreamscape to communicate with others. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rwCh2qTYPA44KEoK]{Dream Council} as an innate occult spell.

Shatter Space.description:
The sheer power of your magic fractures reality. Use this amp in place of a psi cantrip's normal amp entry. The cantrip must be one that takes 2 or more actions to cast.

Amp You or one target of the spell are surrounded by a spiral of torn space. This is an aura, and you choose the radius of the emanation, up to 20 feet. A creature that starts its turn in the aura or enters the aura during its turn takes [[/r 1d6[slashing]]] damage for every level of the amped psi cantrip, with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. If the creature critically fails, the torn space throws it off balance and it falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. The aura lasts until the beginning of your next turn. You can choose whether the aura affects the creature emitting it.

Shattering Strike (Monk).description: The force of your considered blow shatters objects and defenses alike. Make an unarmed Strike. It bypasses the target’s resistances. If the target has Hardness, the Strike treats the Hardness as if it were half its value.

Shattering Strike (Weapon Improviser).description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FSxugo3zTgRhW7Og]{Improvised Pummel}

Trigger An improvised weapon that you are wielding becomes broken as a result of a critical success on an Improvised Pummel.

The improvised weapon shatters, destroying it completely but dealing an additional [[/r 3d6 #piercing]] piercing damage to the creature you hit with the Improvised Pummel. This extra damage you apply on the critical hit doesn’t double from the critical hit, as normal.

Shield Wall.description:
Trigger Your shield is raised and an adjacent ally Raises a Shield.

You use your shield in tandem with an ally's, forming a barricade. Both you and the triggering creature have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{Standard Cover} as long as you remain adjacent to each other and you both have your shields raised; when this is no longer the case, the effect ends. You and your ally can't use this cover to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, as it's obvious you're standing there holding your shields, but you and your ally can use it to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover}. Normally, if you and your ally don't move, Shield Wall lasts until the beginning of your next turn, when your shield is no longer raised.

Shining Arms.description: When you cast light, you can modify its target to be 1 melee weapon, either unattended or possessed by you or a willing ally, and modify its duration to be 1 minute. If you do, add the following to its effects: When a creature wielding the weapon critically hits a foe, you can Dismiss the Spell as a reaction, causing the foe to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round. After you use this reaction, you can't use this modification again for 10 minutes.

Shiny Button Eyes.description: You've polished your eyes to reflect the smallest details in dimmest light. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.i4yRvVwvXbGZDsD1]{Canny Acumen} skill feat as a bonus feat, but you must choose Perception. Additionally, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks against visual illusions.

Shoony Lore.name: Saber dos Shoony
Shoony Lore.description: Por crescer numa sociedade shoony, você aprendeu o valor da honestidade, amizade, e trabalho duro, mesmo durante tempos difíceis. Você é treinado nas perícias de Diplomacia e Sobrevivência. Se você já se tornaria automaticamente treinado nessas perícias (devido à sua biografia ou classe, por exemplo), você se torna treinado na perícia da sua escolha. Você também se torna treinado na perícia Saber dos Shoony.

Shooting Stars Stance.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YW4FdWgzTwRFneFF]{Monastic Weaponry}

You enter a stance that lets you throw @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.fjkwYZ0hRmBztwBG]{Shuriken} with lightning speed. While in this stance, you can use your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with shuriken instead.

Sickening Bite.description:
Your saliva causes severe nausea and mild fever in the living, weakening them so that you can more easily finish them off. When you critically hit a creature with your jaws, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. This is a disease effect.

If you are satiated, you can end your satiation to make the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} on a regular hit instead.

Silver's Refrain.name: Refrão da Prata
Silver's Refrain.description: Você aprende o truque mágico de composição @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xM35hJacTM1BSXUl]{Refrão de Prata}, que ajuda quando estiver lutando contra demônios.

Simple Crystal Magic.name: Magias de Cristal Simples
Simple Crystal Magic.description:
Arquétipo Guarda dos Cristais

Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Guarda dos Cristais

Contanto que você medite antes de uma pedra preciosa valer pelo menos 10 po como parte de suas preparações diárias, você é capaz de ver a magia como runas fluidas que revelam informações sobre objetos mágicos e pode escrever uma runa pessoal que o represente. Você ganha os truques mágicos ler aura e sigilo. Você conjura esses truques mágicos como magias arcanas inatas à vontade. Um truque mágico é elevado para um nível de magia igual à metade do seu nível arredondado para cima.

(Tradução não oficial - Age of Ashes livro 4)

Sing to the Steel.description: You strike magical tones that can turn the tide of combat. You and your allies within 30 feet gain the effects of one of the following runes until the end of your next turn: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Wm0X7Pfd1bfocPSv]{Corrosive}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LwQb7ryTC8FlOXgX]{Disrupting}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.M5M1WJ5KzbYfRGsY]{Frost}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock}, or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.dTxbaa7HSiJbIuNN]{Thundering}. The effects apply to a single weapon the creature is holding or one of the creature's unarmed attacks. You choose the rune and the effect applies to all creatures. You can use an action, which has the concentrate trait, to extend the duration of the rune for 1 additional round up to a maximum of 1 minute. If this would give a weapon or unarmed attack more property runes than its normal maximum, an existing property rune (as the creature chooses) is suppressed until the spell ends.

Sink and Swim.description: Your body looks like it's made of flowing water, clear and pristine, providing a natural grace to all your movements. You gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed. If you already had a swim Speed, it's increased by 10 feet. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.eBgO5gp5kKhGtmk9]{Water Transfer} activity, which enables you to teleport through a body of water.

Siphon Life.description:
Experiences with necromantic energy have left a permanent mark on you, casting you in a deathlike pallor, chilling your body temperature to be ice-cold, turning your very blood black, and giving you the power to rip out an enemy's life force. Strike with an unarmed attack. If you hit and the target is a living creature, it takes [[/r 4d6[negative]]] damage, depending on its Fortitude save. If the target takes any negative damage, you gain an equal number of temporary Hit Points, which last for 1 minute.

Critical Success The enemy takes no additional negative damage and becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Success The enemy takes half the additional negative damage.

Failure The enemy takes full additional negative damage.

Critical Failure The enemy takes double the additional negative damage.

Six Pillars Stance.description:
Requirements You are unarmored.

You stand firm, steeling your mind and body, allowing you to use your magic unperturbed. While in this stance, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by using actions with the concentrate or manipulate traits. In addition, when you cast a spell that requires one or more actions while in this stance, your unarmed Strikes gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.P80mwvCAEncR2snK]{Stance: Six Pillars Stance}

Sixth Pillar Dedication.description:
You use your physical discipline to channel your magic. If your proficiency rank in unarmed attacks is at least expert, your proficiency rank in spell attacks increases to expert. Likewise, if your proficiency rank in spell attacks is at least expert, your proficiency rank in unarmed attacks improves to expert. You become an expert in Athletics, or in another trained skill if you were already expert in Athletics.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.F5gBiVGbS8YSgPSI]{Sixth Pillar} archetype.

Sixth Sense.description:
Your psychic abilities also allow you to detect the lingering thoughts of spirits and similar entities. While you're exploring but not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Searching}, the GM rolls a secret check for you to find haunts that usually require Searching, as well as spirits, creatures on the Ethereal Plane, and beings made entirely of spiritual essence, such as celestials, fiends, and monitors.

You can also potentially notice ethereal creatures and spirits inside solid objects, provided they are within 30 feet of you. This applies while Searching, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seeking}, and on the automatic secret check from Sixth Sense. You can still notice spirits only on a successful check, and you can't see them if they're more than 5 feet inside an object.

When you notice a creature with your Sixth Sense, you also learn its location, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to you if it had been @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}.

Skeletal Transformation.description: You rearrange your bones into a bestial shape. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form} as a divine innate spell. When you cast it, you choose the spell's level: 3rd, 4th, or 5th. Your battle form looks like a skeletal version of the animal. In this form, you retain the benefits of any skeleton feats that do not require the use of hands or the ability to communicate.

Skeleton Commander.description:
You gain the ability to summon your own skeletal minions. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.c3b6LdLlQDPngNIb]{Create Undead} rituals to create three types of undead for which you meet the prerequisites. These undead must have the skeleton trait or be other skeletal undead the GM agrees to. You can't teach these rituals to anyone else, and you can't participate in either ritual while allowing someone else to serve as the primary caster unless they also know the ritual.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Religion checks for create undead rituals. You can also perform the ritual without the aid of a secondary caster; in this case, you attempt the secondary check normally performed by that caster.

Skeptic's Defense.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You are targeted by or are in the area of a mental spell or effect

You don't believe in any mental twaddle, and you're certainly not afraid of it. You scoff and verbally refute the triggering effect, attempting a counteract check using your Intimidation modifier with a counteract level of half your level rounded up. If you succeed, you ignore the triggering effect, though any other creatures that were also targeted or in the area are still affected. If the source of the effect you successfully counteracted understands your language and has an Intelligence modifier of -3 or higher, that creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} for 1 round.

Skim Scroll.description:
Prerequisites Scroll Trickster Dedication

You can activate the magic of a scroll with a cursory read as you draw it from your belt. You Interact to draw forth a scroll, then use Trick Magic Item on the scroll.

Sky and Heaven Stance.description:
Prerequisites Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication

Requirements You are unarmored

You enter a stance perfected by past champions of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven, allowing you to make jagged strikes like flashes of lightning through the sky. The only Strikes you can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These unarmed attacks deal 1d10 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits. While in Sky and Heaven Stance, you gain resistance 2 to electricity and resistance 2 to sonic damage. These resistances increase to 5 at 12th level and to 8 at 18th level.

Skyseeker.description:
Prerequisites Sky and Heaven Stance Requirements You are in Sky and Heaven Stance.

You Leap toward an opponent. At any point in the Leap, you can make a single Strike against a creature within your reach. At 12th level, if you hit with this Strike, instead of finishing your Leap, you can immediately attempt a second Leap from the space where you struck the target of your Strike. You can make a single Strike against a target within your reach during this second Leap as well. At 16th level, you can attempt a third Leap if your second Strike hits, and you can attack a target at any point during this third Leap. All Leaps made during this activity gain a +10-foot status bonus to the total height or distance of your leap, and no two Strikes can target the same creature.

Slayer's Blessing.description:
You carry scraps of materials dangerous to undead and can apply them to your weapon. When you use Slayer's Strike, before making the Strike, you can choose either the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune or a precious material: cold iron, darkwood, or silver. Any Strike that gets extra positive damage from this use of Slayer's Strike also gets the benefits of the rune or counts as that material.

At 14th level, add adamantine and mithral to the list of materials you can choose from.

Slayer's Presence.description: Your very presence strikes fear into the undead. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JpcegMRqdizrkG0m]{Slayer's Identification} and succeed at your check, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.RCjMbLyRnG70R7cO]{Frighten Undead} as a free action, targeting the creature you identified. Any time you get a critical success to Frighten Undead, if the target's level is lower than yours, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round.

Sleeper Hold.name: Aperto Dormente
Sleeper Hold.description:
Requerimentos Você possui uma criatura agarrada ou restringida.

Você aperta pontos cruciais do sistema nervoso de seu alvo, impedindo o funcionamento do corpo dele. Faça um teste de Atletismo para Agarrar a criatura, com os efeitos de sucesso e sucesso crítico a seguir em vez dos efeitos normais.

Sucesso Crítico O alvo fica inconsciente por 1 minuto, embora permaneça de pé e não solte o que está segurando.

Sucesso O alvo fica desajeitado 1 até o final do próximo turno dele.

Sleepwalker Dedication.description:
You've learned to manipulate states of consciousness, beginning with your own. You can send yourself into a half-awake, daydreaming state and gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.5LW1k5DUkzbbYuYL]{Daydream Trance} action.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.OBTmo8rD2x8kFzeH]{Sleepwalker} archetype.

Slice and Swipe.description:
Access Help either the Washboard Dogs or the Diobel Sweepers destroy their rival.

Requirements You're wielding a melee weapon that deals slashing damage and you have a free hand.

You attempt a melee Strike with the required weapon. If you hit and deal damage and the result of your attack roll exceeds the target's Perception DC, you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} a small object from the target (as if you had succeeded at that task using the Thievery skill). Depending on the object, the target might realize that it has been stolen, and onlookers might realize you have stolen the object if the attack roll doesn't exceed their Perception DCs.

Sociable Vow.description: You can leverage your vow in more social interactions. The circumstance bonus from your Binding Vow also applies to attempts to Gather Information, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} you make directly in service of fulfilling the vow.

Social Purview.description:
Prerequisites Vigilante Dedication

You have built a reputation for yourself in your social identity. Choose one archetype that you meet the prerequisites for. You gain that archetype’s dedication feat and can select feats from that archetype, even if you haven’t yet gained enough feats in the vigilante archetype to take another dedication feat.

These feats become part of your social identity and gain the social trait—for instance, a fighter vigilante could take the wizard dedication feat and have a wizard social identity. Using these feats in your social identity doesn’t risk exposing your vigilante identity, but using them in your vigilante identity could put you at risk for exposure.

Sodbuster.name: Cava-Relva
Sodbuster.description:
Pré-requisitos Cavar Rapidamente

Anos capinando lavoura o tornaram uma escavador experiente. Você adquire velocidade de escavação de 3 metros por solo remexido ou sujeira.

Song of Grace and Speed.description: You instill great swiftness into your allies. You and all allies within 30 feet become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 minute and can use the additional action to Strike, Stride, or Step.

Song of the Fallen.name: Canção dos Caídos
Song of the Fallen.description:
Pré-requisitos reserva de focus

O poder em movimento de suas músicas pode fazer com que os espíritos dos mortos ressuscitem e lutem ao seu lado. Você aprende a magia de composição @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IGXGs9PlqUCvODcH]{canção dos caídos}. Aumente o número de pontos de foco em seu pool de foco em 1.

(Tradução não oficial - Age of Ashes livro 6)

Sound Mirror.description: You twist not just the visual, but the auditory as well, allowing you to pass without a sound and create minor noises as distractions-perfect for misdirection and infiltration. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} on yourself as a 2nd-level innate occult spell and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.yV7Ouzaoe7DHLESI]{Ventriloquism} as a 1st-level innate occult spell, both once per day. You also can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound} as an innate occult cantrip. You become trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs, and your key spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Space-Time Shift.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger Your turn begins.

You travel just a few moments into the future to immediately arrive at your destination. Your Strides are augmented until the end of your turn, allowing you to instantly teleport to any point you could reach with your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride} instead of traversing normally to the location. Your augmented Strides have the teleport trait and don't trigger reactions that can be triggered by move actions or upon leaving or entering a square. You also augment your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} actions in this way if you have the corresponding movement type.

Spark of Independence.description: You touch a creature with the minion trait and share the heightened sense of autonomy you've discovered. The minion is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round and is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes. It can use this extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Speaking Sky.name: Speaking Sky
Speaking Sky.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ze9vb0wlRmWWqnXC]{Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication}

You can hear air movement like soft whispers. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.mRlp0HovIaa3Llf9]{Speaking Sky} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Specialized Companion (Animal Trainer).description:
Prerequisites Splendid Companion

The animal companion you gain from the Animal Trainer Dedication feat gains one specialization of your choice. Increase its proficiency rank in Performance to legendary instead of one of the specialization's skill increases.

Specialized Mount.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AYBfwGImT28lUdue]{Incredible Mount}

You’ve trained your mount to perform in unusual or even extreme circumstances, granting it abilities far beyond others of its kind. Your mount gains one specialization of your choice.

Special You can select this feat up to three times. Each time, add a different specialization to your mount. You mount can’t have more than three specializations.

Speech of the Mammoth Lords.description: You've learned the ancient tongue spoken by the creatures of the far north. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, use the Diplomacy skill with, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce} megafauna. In most cases, megafauna of the Realm of the Mammoth Lords will hear you out.

Spell Gem.description:
Inspired by the degenerate demiliches your kind sometimes devolves into, you've embedded a gem into your brow, fusing it to your necrotic flesh. This gem has been specially calibrated to hold one of the following spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.yrZA4k2VAqEP8xx7]{Repulsion}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r784cIz17eWujtQj]{Scrying}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing}. You must decide which spell your gem contains when you take this feat; changing the spell requires retraining the feat. Once per day, you can drain the gem's magical energy to Cast the Spell without spending a spell slot.

At 18th level, you can heighten whichever spell you chose to 7th level. At 20th level, you can heighten whichever spell you chose to 8th level; regardless of which spell you chose, you can instead drain the gem's magical energy to cast an 8th-level spell turning without spending a spell slot.

Spell Relay.description:
Trigger An ally Casts a Spell and you are within that spell’s range.

You open the power in your blood to your ally’s spellcasting, using your magic to boost their range. Your ally can use you as the point of origin for their spell, calculating range and cover from your space instead of their own.

Spell Trickster Dedication.description:
Your experience with magic and its traditions lets you specialize in the casting of certain spells, customizing familiar spells to create novel effects. Whenever you gain a feat from this archetype, you either learn to modify the effects of a single spell, or you change one of the modifications from a previous feat. Each time you Cast the Spell corresponding to the feat you chose, you decide whether to cast its normal or modified version. You can only apply one modification to a spell at a time, even if you know more than one modification for that spell. Besides modifications mentioned in the feat, the spell functions as normal.

Choose up to two 4th-level spell trickster archetype feats for which you meet the spell-casting prerequisite. You gain those feats, ignoring their level prerequisite.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.DztQF2FexWvnzcaE]{Spell Trickster} archetype. The two feats you gain from taking the dedication don't count toward this total.

Spelunker.description: Living underground, you have learned to find your way without landmarks or even solid ground. If you roll a success on an Survival check to Sense Direction or an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead. You're not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} when you attempt to Climb.

Spine Stabber.description: The quills on your arms are particularly sharp and sturdy. You gain a quills unarmed attack that deals [[/r 1d6[piercing]]] damage. Your quills are in the knife weapon group and have the finesse and unarmed traits.

Spiral Sworn.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

You trace a spiral in the air while intoning prayers to Pharasma, gaining her blessing for a time. For 3 rounds, your Strikes and spells deal additional damage against undead, creatures in possession of an imprisoned soul, or creatures you have witnessed create or command undead. You gain a status bonus to damage with your Strikes against these creatures equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Spells you cast from spell slots gain a status bonus to damage against these creatures equal to the level of the spell; this bonus applies only to spells that deal damage and don't have a duration.

If your spiral is glowing, you can target a willing creature in its light. If you do, that creature gains the bonuses instead of you.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.2gVP04ZWYbQdX3uS]{Effect: Spiral Sworn}

Spirit Speaker.description:
You know that when an animal dies, its spirit lingers briefly before moving on. Using low chants, body language that shows respect, and special movements that demonstrate to the spirit that you are an ally, you glean information from a spirit before it departs. This is a 1-minute activity. You must begin the activity while adjacent to the body of an animal or beast that died within the last 1 minute.

As part of the activity, you ask one simple question of the spirit. Attempt a Nature check at a DC determined by the GM (normally, this is the appropriate DC for the level of the animal or beast when it was alive). Regardless of the result of your check, the spirit immediately departs and can't be used for Spirit Speaker again. If the creature had the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition when it died, you can't get a result better than a critical failure.

Only one creature can use Spirit Speaker on a given dead animal, as the effort takes the spirit's full attention.

Critical Success The spirit answers you truthfully. The spirit's answer is likely to be terse or cryptic compared to normal communication with an animal, and it can pertain only to things the creature directly experienced or considered important. The spirit doesn't remember anything that happened more than 1 day ago.

Success As critical success, but the spirit doesn't recall anything that happened more than 1 hour ago.

Failure The spirit doesn't answer you.

Critical Failure The spirit is wracked with misery or bewilderment and gives you an erroneous answer.

Splinter Faith.description:
Your faith in your deity is represented in an extremely unusual way that some might call heretical. When you select this feat, you should detail the fundamental tenets of your splinter faith, though it shouldn’t affect the deity’s edicts or anathema. Choose four domains. These domains must be chosen from among your deity’s domains, your deity’s alternate domains, and up to one domain that isn’t on either list and isn’t anathematic to your deity. Any domain spell you cast from a domain that isn’t on either of your deity’s lists is always heightened to 1 level lower than usual for a focus spell. For the purpose of abilities that depend on your deity’s domains, the four domains you chose are your deity’s domains, and any of your deity’s domains you didn’t choose are now among your deity’s alternate domains.

Special Unless you take this feat at 1st level, changing the way you relate to your deity requires retraining, as described in the Changing Faith section below. If you take this feat and previously benefited from any effect that requires a domain your splinter faith doesn’t include, such as a domain spell from Domain Initiate, you lose that effect.

Springing Leaper.description:
Prerequisites expert in Athletics

Your powerful legs allow you to make sudden and dramatic leaps. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} as a 2-action activity to double the distance you can Leap vertically, or Leap as a 3-action activity to triple the distance you can Leap vertically. You don’t automatically fail @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} for jumping in a different direction than your Stride.

Squawk!.description:
Trigger You critically fail a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check against a creature that doesn’t have the tengu trait.

You let out an awkward squawk, ruffle your feathers, or fake some other birdlike tic to cover up a social misstep or faux pas. You get a failure on the triggering check, rather than a critical failure. All creatures that witnessed you Squawk are temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Squirm Free.description:
Trigger A creature grabs, immobilizes, or restrains you.

You're used to slipping out of a bigger creature's grasp or escaping a child's overly enthusiastic hug. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}.

Staff Acrobat Dedication.name: Dedicação de Acrobata do Cajado
Staff Acrobat Dedication.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Acrobata do Cajado} Pré-requisitos Destreza 16; treinado em Acrobatismo; treinado em Atletismo; treinado com pelo menos uma das seguintes armas: cajado, bō, cajado-funda halfling, ou qualquer arma do grupo lança ou haste (referida neste arquétipo como "seu cajado")

Quando você faz @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{Salto em Altura}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Saltar} ou @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Salto em Distância} enquanto empunha seu cajado, você ganha +2 de bônus de circunstância em qualquer teste de Atletismo necessário e adiciona 1,5 metros à distância que você pode saltar vertical e horizontalmente. Você pode @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Empurrar} e @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Derrubar}, mesmo que não tenha uma mão livre, desde que empunhe seu cajado. Finalmente, quando você obtém sucesso em um teste para @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Equilibrar}, enquanto empunhando seu cajado, obtém um sucesso crítico.

Especial Você não pode selecionar outro talento de dedicação até ganhar dois outros talentos do arquétipo do Acrobata do Cajado.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse livro 1)

Staff Sweep.name: Varredura com Cajado
Staff Sweep.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Acrobata Cajado} Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Acrobata do Cajado Requirementos Você está empunhando seu cajado.

Você varre seus inimigos com seu cajado. Faça um teste de Atletismo para @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Empurrar} ou @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Derrubar} e compare o resultado com os CDs apropriados de até dois inimigos, cada um dos quais deve estar ao seu alcance e não mais que um metro e meio de distância.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse livro 1)

Stage Fighting.description:
Prerequisites Gladiator Dedication

You pull punches to give a better show. You don’t take the usual –2 circumstance penalty when making a nonlethal attack with a weapon or unarmed attack that doesn’t have the nonlethal trait.

Staggering Blow.description:
Requirements You're riding a megafauna companion that has a melee Strike.

You've trained your megafauna companion to stagger its enemies, impeding their ability to fight back. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} to order your megafauna companion to spend both its actions making a single, powerful Strike. The attack deals an extra die of weapon damage, and if the attack hits and deals damage, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn.

Stalking Feline Mask.description: Like Azure Leopard, the Patient Warden, your mask makes you most at home in the night and teaches you how to use the darkness to hunt. You gain greater darkvision. Immediately after you Cast a non-cantrip Spell with the shadow or darkness trait, you can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} as a free action. You must still meet the usual requirements of the action you choose, such as having cover or concealment to Hide and being undetected or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to Sneak.

Stalwart Standard.description: Your banner makes it harder for your foes to push your allies around and encourages your allies to protect the innocent. Allies benefiting from your Cavalier's Banner feat also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}. Each benefited ally also gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against any creature that has dealt damage to an innocent of a lower level than that ally within the last round; summoned creatures, companions, or any creatures you or your allies put into danger on purpose to attempt to gain this bonus don't count.

Stand Still.description:
Acionamento Uma criatura em seu alcance usa uma ação de movimento ou deixa um quadrado durante uma ação de movimento que ela está usando.

Você golpeia quando seu adversário tenta fugir. Faça um Golpe corpo a corpo contra a criatura acionadora. Se o ataque for um acerto crítico e o acionamento for uma ação de movimento, você interrompe essa ação.

Startling Appearance (Vigilante).description:
Requirements You are completely unnoticed by the target creature.

You can startle foes who are unaware of your presence. Make a Strike against your target. That creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against this Strike, as normal. If your Strike hits, the target remains flat-footed for the rest of your turn and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} (frightened 2 on a critical hit).

Steadfast Ally.name: Aliado Inabalável
Steadfast Ally.description:
Pré-requisitos Empatia Leal
