Somente a sua presença é suficiente para fornecer apoio emocional aos seus aliados. Você pode usar a reação @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Auxiliar} para conceder um bônus ao teste de resistência de Vontade de outra criatura, mesmo quando você não estiver preparado para ajudar.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse livro 3)

Steal Essence.description:
Prerequisites legendary in Thievery or master in Arcana, Nature, Occult, or Religion

Requirements A magic item is within your reach.

Being in the presence of the aeon orbs as they deteriorated has taught you how to siphon energy, and you do so with the required magic item. The DC to steal the properties of a magic item is equal to the DC for the item’s level or the normal DC to Steal the item, whichever is higher. The targeted item then becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours. If the object was on a creature, that creature is also temporarily immune (which prevents you from attempting to Steal the Essence of another object on it).

If you successfully steal the properties of an item, it loses its magical properties for 24 hours and you can move those properties to a non-magical object of the same general kind (such as moving a hat’s properties to another piece of headgear or moving a weapon’s properties to another weapon) for the same length of time. If the moved properties are counteracted, they return immediately to the original item. You automatically fail to Steal the Essence of an artifact, cursed item, or similar item.

Steal the Sky.name: Steal the Sky
Steal the Sky.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ze9vb0wlRmWWqnXC]{Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication}

You can take away the air that keeps a flying foe aloft. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pJiqXAdxSjOeNA7C]{Steal the Sky} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Stitch Flesh.description: You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} to restore Hit Points to undead creatures, not just living ones. The techniques you use to do so vary, but all require sutures, bandages, and other tools included in healer's tools. Some conditions that might raise the DC of treating undead's wounds differ from that of living creatures. For instance, the GM might increase the DC if the undead being treated is in a church of Pharasma or the wounds were caused by powerful positive energy.

Storm Shroud.description:
Frequency once per hour

You become surrounded by a swirling storm of rain, sand, snow, or clouds, whichever of those suits your bound terrain. This activity has traits appropriate to the storm you create-typically earth for sand and water for rain, snow, or clouds. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} for 1 minute. You can't use this concealment to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, as normal for concealment that makes your position obvious.

Storyteller's Mask.description: Your mask remembers the stories of Shifting Frog, Storyteller of the Past and Future. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qsNeG9KZpODSACMq]{Foresight} once per day as an innate spell, either arcane if you have Wizard Dedication or primal if you have Druid Dedication, but the duration is 10 minutes instead of 1 hour. Immediately after you Cast a non-cantrip Spell that targets only a single foe, you can Recall Knowledge about that foe.

Strategic Bypass.description: Your plans account for your foes’ resistances, enabling you to strike a telling blow. When you hit with a Strike on which you substituted your attack roll due to Devise a Strategem, you ignore an amount of resistance equal to your Intelligence modifier for each resistance that applies against your attack.

Straveika.description: You descend from one of the truly ancient vampires, a nosferatu cursed to eternal life but not eternal youth. People call you straveika, or ancient-born. The vestiges of your forebear’s powers of domination have left you with an understanding of how a creature’s intentions change its behaviors. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} and Perception DCs against attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie} to you.

Studious Adept.description: You achieve a breakthrough in your exploration of magic. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{Humanoid Form} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image} as 2nd-level arcane innate spells. You can cast each of these arcane innate spells once per day.

Stumbling Feint.description:
Prerequisites expert in Deception, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7FRYyKXDKjGoANYj]{Stumbling Stance}

Requirements You are in Stumbling Stance.

You lash out confusingly with what seems to be a weak move but instead allows you to unleash a dangerous flurry of blows upon your unsuspecting foe.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows}, you can attempt a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} as a free action just before the first @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}. On a success, instead of making the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against your next attack, they become flat-footed against both attacks from the Flurry of Blows.

Stumbling Stance.description:
Prerequisites trained in Deception

You enter a seemingly unfocused stance that mimics the movements of the inebriated—bobbing, weaving, leaving false openings, and distracting your enemies from your true movements.

While in this stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}. The only @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} you can make are stumbling swing unarmed attacks. These deal [[/r 1d8 #bludgeoning]] bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

If an enemy hits you with a melee Strike while in this stance, it becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the next stumbling swing Strike you make against it before the end of your next turn.

Stunning Appearance.description:
Prerequisites Startling Appearance

Your sudden appearance leaves your foe unable to respond. When you use Startling Appearance, if your foe’s level is equal to or lower than yours, they are also Atordoado 1 on a hit, or stunned 2 on a critical hit.

Stunning Blows.description:
Pré-requisitos Rajada de Golpes

O poder focado de sua rajada ameaça sobrepujar o seu oponente. Quando mirar a mesma criatura com dois Golpes de sua Rajada de Golpes, você pode tentar atordoá-la. Se um dos Golpes atingir e causar dano, o alvo deve obter sucesso em um salvamento de Fortitude contra sua CD de classe ou ficará atordoado 1 (ou atordoado 3 em uma falha crítica). Este é um efeito de incapacitação.

Subtle Shank.description:
Access Help either the Washboard Dogs or the Diobel Sweepers destroy their rival.

Requirements You have a melee weapon of light bulk @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} on your person via the Stealth skill, and the target isn't aware of it.

You draw a concealed weapon, attack with it, and then hide it away again in one smooth motion. Interact to draw the weapon, Strike with that weapon, and then Conceal it with a Stealth check. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} for this attack.

Superimpose Time Duplicates.description:
Frequency once per hour

You call alternate versions of yourself, either from a different timeline or perhaps yourself from a different point in your current timeline, to aid you in combat. Until the start of your next turn, these alternate selves flicker in and out in your vicinity, providing flanking for you against all enemies within your reach. Flanking with your time duplicates is the same as flanking with an ally and so is subject to effects like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.9qV49KjZujZnSp6w]{All-Around Vision} or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.PNpmVmD21zViDtGC]{Deny Advantage} class feature.

Superior Sight.name: Visão Superior
Superior Sight.description:
Seus sentidos são inigualáveis. Você ganha +2 de bônus de circunstância nos testes de Percepção e ganha visão na penumbra. Se você já tem visão na penumbra, obtenha uma visão no escuro. Além disso, quando você mira em um inimigo, você obtém sucesso automaticamente no teste simples, se esse inimigo estiver ocultado, escondido ou indetectado.

(Tradução não oficial - Age of Ashes livro 6)

Suplex.description:
Requirements You have a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

Flexing your entire body, you heave your opponent over your head and slam them into the ground. Make an unarmed melee Strike against the creature you have grabbed or restrained; on a success, the target lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and on a critical success, the target lands prone and takes an additional [[/r 2d6[bludgeoning]]] damage. Regardless of whether the Strike is successful, you immediately release your hold on the target.

Surprise Attack.name: Ataque Surpresa
Surprise Attack.description:
Prerequisite Assassin Dedication

You act before foes can react. On the first round of combat, if you roll Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures that haven’t acted are Flat-Footed to you.

Surprise Strike.description:
Prerequisites Weapon Improviser Dedication

Whenever you make a Strike with an improvised weapon against a creature that hasn’t seen you make a Strike using an improvised weapon or that is otherwise ignorant of your skill with improvised weapons, the creature is Flat-Footed against you for that Strike.

Swashbuckler's Riposte.description: You've learned to riposte against ill-conceived attacks. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EfjoIuDmtUn4yiow]{Opportune Riposte} reaction.

Swashbuckler's Speed.description: You move faster, with or without @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}. Increase the status bonus to your Speeds when you have panache to a +10-foot status bonus; you also gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speeds when you don't have panache.

Swift Leap.description:
Your undead physiology allows you to leap quickly toward or away from your opponent. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

If you are satiated, you can choose to end your satiation to instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} without triggering reactions, as you take a quick, enormous jump before any foe can react to your movement.

Swift River.name: Rio Veloz
Swift River.description:
Acionamento Seu turno acaba e você tem uma penalidade de estado em sua Velocidade ou está imobilizado ou lento.

Você flui como água, evitando todas as restrições. Encerre uma penalidade de estado em sua Velocidade, ou encerre uma condição de imobilizado ou lento que esteja afetando-o.

Tangled Forest Stance.name: Postura da Floresta Emaranhada
Tangled Forest Stance.description:
Requirementos Você está sem armadura.

Você estende seus braços como galhos retorcidos para interferir nos movimentos de seus adversários. Você pode realizar ataques desarmados de galho chicoteante. Esses ataques causam 1d8 de dano cortante, pertencem ao grupo pugilato e possuem os traços acuidade, ágil, desarmado e não-letal. Enquanto estiver na Postura da Floresta Emaranhada e puder agir, cada inimigo em seu alcance que tentar se mover para longe de você deve obter sucesso em um salvamento de Reflexos, teste de Acrobatismo ou Atletismo contra sua CD de classe ou ficará imobilizado para essa ação. Se preferir, você pode permitir que o inimigo se mova.

Target of Psychic Ire.description:
Your magic saturates your surroundings with hateful psychic energy. Use this amp in place of a psi cantrip's normal amp entry. The cantrip must be one that takes 2 or more actions to cast and targets a creature.

Amp Choose one target of the spell. Psychic phenomena turn themselves on the target-typically, objects fling themselves at the creature. At the beginning of each of the target's turns, it takes [[/r 1d4[bludgeoning]]] damage for each spell level of the psi cantrip this amp was added to, with a basic Reflex save. The target remains marked by psychic ire for 3 rounds. The effect persists even if you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or leave the area.

Targeting Finisher.description:
Your attack harms and hinders your foe. Choose a particular part of your foe from the list below and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}. If you hit and damage the target, apply the effect corresponding to the chosen part. This hindrance lasts until the end of your next turn. On a critical hit, you also apply a lesser effect lasting for 1 minute.

  • Arm (or another limb used for attacks, such as a tentacle) The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} 2. On a critical hit, it is also enfeebled 1 for 1 minute.
  • Head The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} 2. On a critical hit, it is also stupefied 1 for 1 minute.
  • Legs The target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds. On a critical hit, it also takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute.

Tenacious Blood Magic.description:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger You apply an effect from your blood magic that lasts for 1 round.

You have learned how to invest magic more deeply by witnessing Aroden’s works. The triggering blood magic effect lasts for 1 minute instead of 1 round.

Tenacious Toxins.description: Your victims tend to expire long before your poisons, since the latter have been specifically formulated to last longer. The maximum duration of any poison you create increases by an amount equal to the poison’s stage 1 interval, to a maximum of twice the poison’s maximum duration.

Terrifying Resistance.description:
Prerequisites expert in Intimidation

The spells of those you have @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} are less effective on you. If you succeed in Demoralizing a creature, for the next 24 hours you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against that creature’s spells.

Thaumaturge Dedication.name: Dedicação de Taumaturgo
Thaumaturge Dedication.description:
You've uncovered basic thaumaturgy. You become trained in thaumaturge class DC. Choose an implement; you can use it to Glimpse Vulnerability, but don't gain its benefits. You also gain a few esoterica, allowing you to use esoterica actions. You become trained in your choice of Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion; if you were already trained in these, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Yfl6q6Pi42FttDRE]{Glimpse Vulnerability} action.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.K9Krytj8OtUvQxoc]{Thaumaturge} archetype.

Thaumaturge's Demesne.description:
You have claimed an area or location as your demesne, granting you the ability to ward and protect it. When you select this feat, choose a demesne, an area of no more than 2,000 square feet. You must legitimately own the area or, if its a public area, you must lay claim to the area without anyone contesting it.

Once you've chosen your demesne, it's automatically protected by an arcane @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.onjZCEHs3JJJRTD0]{Private Sanctum} spell with an unlimited duration, heightened to half your level rounded up and using your thaumaturge class DC in place of a spell DC, if necessary. Additionally, the demesne is attended by three unseen custodians, as a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uuoPmbjEtqzWZs0v]{Unseen Custodians} ritual, and one object in the area gains an elemental sentinel, as a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rOwOLlfVgLMg1FND]{Elemental Sentinel} ritual.

Thaumaturge's Investiture.description: Magical equipment and gear are the tools of your trade, and you know you need as many as possible to help you against the supernatural. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.4vu6P3cYoOOeUbLK]{Incredible Investiture} skill feat, increasing your limit on invested items from 10 to 12. The limit increases to 14 if you have Charisma 18, 16 if you have Charisma 20, 18 if you have Charisma 22, and 20 if you have Charisma 24.

Thoughtform Summoning.description: You can create a prototypical creature from the depths of your imagination instead of calling one from elsewhere. Whenever you summon a creature, you can choose to instead create a psychic construct of that creature. This grants it resistance to physical damage equal to half its level, weakness 5 to force and mental damage, and the ability to pass through enemies' spaces without needing to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} (though it can't end its turn in an occupied space).

Thoughtsense.name: Sentido de pensamentos
Thoughtsense.description:
You can detect the flickers of mental activity let off by all thinking creatures. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.JcaIJLGGmst79f1Y]{Thoughtsense} as a vague sense that has a range of 30 feet-like all vague senses, it's only about as precise as an average human's sense of smell, meaning you generally can predict only if a creature is present. Your thoughtsense detects only thinking creatures, so a creature that is unthinking or otherwise immune to mental effects (such as many constructs and oozes) can't be perceived using your thoughtsense, regardless of how precise it is.

While your Psyche is Unleashed, your thoughtsense upgrades to an imprecise sense, letting you use it to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} out creatures.

Tiger Slash.name: Corte do Tigre
Tiger Slash.description:
Pré-requisitos Postura do Tigre

Requirementos Você está na Postura do Tigre.

Você desfere um corte feroz com ambas as mãos. Faça um Golpe de garra do tigre. Ele causa dois dados de dano extras da arma (três dados extras se você for de 14º nível ou superior) e você pode empurrar o alvo 1,5 metros como se tivesse obtido sucesso em Empurrá-lo. Se o ataque for um sucesso crítico e causar dano, adicione seu modificador de Força ao dano persistente de sangramento de sua garra do tigre.

Tiller's Aid.name: Auxílio do Lavrador
Tiller's Aid.description:
Arquétipo Lavrador da Campânula

Pré-requisitos Dedicação da Campânula

Você pode usar a reação Auxiliar para ajudar um membro de sua colheita mesmo se não tiver se preparado para isso.

Tiller's Drive.name: Condução do Lavrador
Tiller's Drive.description:
Arquétipo Lavrador da Campânula

Pré-requisitos Dedicação da Campânula

Seu bônus na Velocidade advindo da Dedicação da Campânula aumenta para +3 metros. Membros da sua colheita recebem +1,5 metros de bônus de circunstância na Velocidade.

Time Mage Dedication.description:
You might be a novice in the temporal arts now, but in the future, you'll hold time in the palm of your hand. As some of your future knowledge leaks back to your present self, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.3wmX7htzOXiHLdAn]{Delay Consequence} domain spell. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell. This feat grants a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover by using the Refocus activity to revisit moments from your past and contemplate futures yet to come. If you already knew delay consequence from a feat or ability that allows you to gain your choice of domain spell, such as Domain Initiate, then when you take this feat, you can retrain that option to gain a different domain spell instead as your personal timeline rearranges itself. You also gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.BvNbDwFYaidKJG9j]{Time Sense} as an innate cantrip usable at will. This innate spell and your focus spells from the time mage archetype are of the same tradition as the spells you used to meet the archetype's prerequisites.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.ydELQFQq0lGLTvrA]{Time Mage} archetype.

Titan Swing.description:
Your limbs tense as you deliver a mighty swing. Make a melee Strike. If it hits, you deal an extra die of weapon damage and push the target back by 5 feet. If you're at least 10th level, increase this to two extra dice and push the target by 10 feet, and if you're at least 18th level, increase it to three extra dice and push the target by 15 feet.

Awakening On a critical hit, you push the target back double the normal distance and knock it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Awakening On a hit, you deal 1d6 bleed damage. This increases to 2d6 at 10th level and 3d6 at 18th level.

Toppling Tentacles.description: When you cast black tentacles, replace the spell's standard effects with the following: Tentacles slither along the ground in the area, attempting to hinder anyone within. Sticky black tentacles attempt to Trip each creature in the area. Attempt spell attack rolls against the Reflex DCs of each affected creature. Any creature you succeed against is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and takes [[/r 3d6[bludgeoning]]] damage. Whenever a creature ends its turn in the area, the tentacles attempt to Trip that creature if it isn't already prone, and they deal [[/r 1d6[bludgeoning]]] damage to any creature already prone. Creatures treat the spell's area as difficult terrain.

Touch Focus.description:
Trigger You begin to Cast a Spell that requires a spell attack roll.

You can redirect a spell's power through you to deliver it within striking distance. If your next action is to Cast a Spell with 1 or more targets and a range farther than touch, you change the range to touch. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack. This only allows you to touch a single target with the spell, even if the spell originally affected more than 1 target. As long as your spell attack is successful, the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} in addition to the spell's normal effects.

Tough Tumbler.name: Tranqueta Robusto
Tough Tumbler.description:
Pré-requisitos Passar por debaixo dos pés

Você já tomou lambidas o bastante correndo pelo campo de batalha e sabe como se defender contra atacantes oportunistas. Seu mobimento acaba somente quando você falha criticamente em um teste de Acrobatismo para Atravessar Acrobaticamente  o espaço de um inimigo (ou você não tem movimentação o bastante para se mover por todo o seu espaço. Você ainda aciona reações em uma falha de Atravessar Acrobaticamente, mas você ganha um bonus +1 circunstancial na sua CA contra ataques que você acionou pelo caminho.

Tower Shield Mastery.description: You've learned how to maximize the defensive abilities of your tower shield. You are constantly @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the additional action only to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} behind your tower shield after you have Raised it.

Towering Growth.description: You're capable of growing as tall as a pine tree for a short time. You gain 2nd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} as a primal innate spell. You can cast this spell twice per day and you must target yourself.

True Gaze.description:
Frequency once per hour

When you focus your eyes carefully, your gaze can pierce through all obfuscations, even magical ones. When you use True Gaze, you gain the effects of a 6th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing} spell, using your Perception modifier for the counteract check.

Tumbling Opportunist.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aFygWxgSv82WyCsl]{Acrobat Dedication}

Frequency once per minute

Requirements Your most recent action was to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jfsmtOx4QgXB19BL]{Tumbling Strike}, and you successfully moved through an enemy’s space.

You use a burst of stamina to perform a breathtaking feat of Acrobatics as you speed through a foe’s space, leaving your foe lying flat on their back. You attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the enemy whose space you moved through. You can use Acrobatics instead of Athletics for this check.

Turn to Mist.description:
Frequency once per hour

You turn into vapor, gaining the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Gaseous Form}.

Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication.name: Dedicação de Lenhador Turpin Rowe
Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.VRUYc3QyRjjOjppc]{Lenhador Turpin Rowe} Pré-requisitos treinado em Sobrevivência Acesso Você deve fazer amizade com pelo menos um talhador Turpin Rowe.

Seu treinamento em extração de madeira o tornou intimamente familiarizado com todos os aspectos da silvicultura, e você treinou extensivamente para alcançar árvores e utilizar o volume a seu favor. Você se torna treinado em Saber de moagem e Saber de floresta, ou um especialista, se já foi treinado. Você sempre pode @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Obter Cobertura} quando estiver no terreno da floresta para se proteger, mesmo que não esteja próximo a um obstáculo, pode Obter Cobertura atrás. Além disso, qualquer inimigo que obtenha cobertura padrão de uma árvore ganha apenas uma cobertura menor contra seus ataques (ou apenas cobertura padrão, se o inimigo ganhar uma cobertura maior).

Especial Você não pode selecionar outro talento de dedicação até ganhar dois outros feitos do arquétipo do Lenhador Turpin Rowe.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse livro 3)

Tweak Appearances.name: Ajustar Aparências
Tweak Appearances.description:
Prerequisites especialista em Manufatura

Você gasta 1 minuto fazendo ajustes rápidos nas roupas e na aparência de alguém, permitindo que suas palavras carreguem mais peso com uma audiência à sua escolha. Enquanto se comunicar com essa audiência, o alvo recebe +1 de bônus de item em testes de Diplomacia e Performance. Se você for mestre em Manufatura, o bônus aumenta para +2; se for lendário em Manufatura, o bônus aumenta para +3. Este bônus dura até que esta habilidade seja usada no alvo novamente, a situação para a qual foi preparada acabe ou o alvo troque de roupa.

Two Truths.description: Your ability to imitate your progenitor is so strong, you can even convince yourself. When you use this action, you alter your thought processes to your progenitor or from your progenitor back to yourself. As long as what you say is true from the point of view of your current identity, you can say it even under effects like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aewxsale5xWEPKLk]{Zone of Truth} that force you to speak truly.

Unbalancing Finisher.description: You attack with a flashy assault that leaves your target off balance. Make a melee Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the end of your next turn.

Undead Empathy.description: Your relationship with undeath gives you a stronger bond with other undead. You can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on mindless undead or make simple requests of them. As long as there aren't living creatures nearby, they usually let you speak. If the undead creature currently is in the thrall of a creature whose level is higher than yours, you typically need a critical success on your Diplomacy skill check.

Undead Master Dedication.description:
You gain the services of an undead companion that travels with you and obeys your commands. The rules for undead companions appear on page 37 and utilize those for animal companions from the Core Rulebook on page 214. Contrary to the usual rules for companions, as an undead master it's possible for you to have more than one undead companion at a time. However, only one of those companions, your "active companion," follows you during exploration and encounters; the rest are reduced to an "inactive" state that can be easily tucked into an inventory or stored in a nearby crypt. If you ever have more than one undead companion, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.8kGpUUUSX1sB2OqQ]{Call Companion} action, with your undead companions taking the place of animal companions.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.f7tFLR7aFonXTLQa]{Undead Master} archetype.

Undead Slayer Dedication.description:
Your training has prepared you to recognize most undead on sight. You become trained in two Lore skills, each about a specific type of undead, or become an expert if you were already trained. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JpcegMRqdizrkG0m]{Slayer's Identification} free action.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.mV0K9sxD3TWnZDcy]{Undead Slayer} archetype.

Underground Network.description:
Prerequisites expert in Society, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{Streetwise}

You’re connected to groups that know what’s going on in the streets, and you can get information out of them quickly. When you use Society to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information} in an area where you have a network (typically a settlement where you’ve spent at least a week or spent a day of downtime to build a network faster), you can contact a member of these groups to get information directly from them. This usually takes about an hour, and it doesn’t draw as much attention as Gathering Information in public might. The check and information gained otherwise follow the normal rules for Gather Information.

In addition, if you have successfully consulted the underground network, you get a +1 circumstance bonus to the next check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KUfLlXDWTcAWhl8l]{Recall Knowledge} you attempt about the subject you were Gathering Information on, or a +2 circumstance bonus if you’re using Underworld Lore for the check. The GM might change the Lore skill related to the network depending on your location or the specifics of the network you’re tapping into.

Uneasy Rest.description: When you cast sleep, you can modify the spell to add the following to its standard effects: Subjects of your spell experience troubled dreams. When a target that failed or critically failed its saving throw wakes up, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Unlimited Demesne.description: You can move your demesne here and there, bringing it wherever your journey takes you. Your demesne expands to a maximum of 10,000 square feet. Once per day, you can call your demesne forth, which takes 1 minute. This has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KPDHmmjJiw7PhTYF]{Resplendent Mansion}, except that it conjures your demesne from its previous location, with all the benefits of Thaumaturge's Demesne in addition to the those of the spell. You must be able to claim the new area, with the same restrictions as Thaumaturge's Demesne.

Unlimited Ghost Flight.description: You put your connection to the material world farther behind you. Your fly Speed no longer restricts the height you can fly. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.zJXsGF61lH0WHw5v]{Ghost Flight}, instead of its normal effect, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed for 10 minutes.

Unnerving Expansion.description: You gather your curse around you and impel it to pour outward, expanding your maelstrom. The radius of the emanation of your curse maelstrom state increases by 5 feet until the end of your curse maelstrom state. The outpouring of the curse is unnerving. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} a creature within the emanation of your curse maelstrom; you don't take penalties for not sharing a language with that creature.

Unrivaled Builder.name: Construtor Incomparável
Unrivaled Builder.description:
Pré-requisitos Útil com as Patas

Construir coisas é como resolver um quebra-cabeça, e você sabe como usar qualquer coisa à sua disposição para fazer o trabalho. Você ganha criação como uma magia primal inata de 5º nível. É necessário ter um volume equivalente de material para criar um item, como madeira ou sucata para fazer um carrinho de mão. Você pode lançar essa magia uma vez por dia.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse livro 3)

Unyielding Disguise.description: When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{Humanoid Form} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} to alter your appearance, the spell's duration is 2 hours. At the end of the duration, you can extend the spell's duration for another hour, but doing so is taxing, making you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}. You can keep extending it in this way, increasing your drained condition by 1 each time, to a maximum duration of 6 hours.

Vampire Dedication.description:
You're a newly risen vampire. You gain the undead and vampire traits and the basic undead benefits, and your undead hunger is for the blood of the living. Your incisors elongate; you gain a fangs unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. They're in the brawling group and have the grapple and unarmed traits. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.dkZ8RxdQFJrdxwQo]{Revulsion} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.bHUrm79wJCcI7L3A]{Sunlight} vulnerabilities detailed on and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.49F65W6VwuXhmv8K]{Drink Blood} ability.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.G3AtnAkIKNHrahmd]{Vampire} archetype.

Vernai Training.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BASCKOPvNGgoHGid]{Achaekek's Grip}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bzKBUK6CH8tuLCfo]{Advanced Red Mantis Magic}

To resurrect a creature you’ve slain, a spellcaster must counteract your influence on its death. The DC of this check is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

In addition, add two 5th-level spells to your Red Mantis assassin spellbook—both spells must be chosen from the following options:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.scTRIrTfXquVYHGw]{Drop Dead},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RCbLd7dfquHnuvrZ]{False Vision},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.U58aQWJ47VrI36yP]{Hallucination},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ucf8eynbZMfUucjE]{Illusory Scene},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9BnhadUO8FMLmeZ3]{Mind Probe}, or
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R9xqCBblkS5KE4y7]{Sending}.

You gain a 5th-level spell slot that you can use to prepare a spell from your Red Mantis assassin spellbook.

Vessel's Form.description:
Frequency once per day

You symbiotically combine your form with that of the entity within you, taking a powerful hybrid form to temporarily boost your abilities in combat while maintaining control. For 1 minute, you gain the following effects.

  • If you were Medium or smaller, you become Large, and your reach increases to 10 feet.
  • You gain a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls and a +1 status bonus on saving throws against spells. If you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.5bCZGpp9yFHXDz1j]{Entity's Resurgence}, the status bonuses to attack and damage rolls increase to +3 during the time that the two effects overlap.
  • If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.1FnZhf5UwSb7Lo3t]{Entity's Strike} feat, the unarmed attack you gained from that feat increases its damage die from 1d6 to 1d8.
  • You gain 40 temporary Hit Points.
  • You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Special This action has the tradition trait appropriate to your entity, typically divine for a demon, occult for an aberration or outer entity, or primal for a fey.

Vicious Evisceration.description: You make a vicious strike that maims your enemy. Make a melee Strike. If the Strike hits and deals damage, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} on a critical success.

Vicious Fangs.description: You aim for your victim's prominent arteries. Your fangs Strike deals an additional [[/r 1d6[bleed]]] on a critical hit. At 14th level, the persistent bleed damage increases to [[/r 2d6[bleed]]], and at 20th level, the persistent bleed damage increases to [[/r 3d6[bleed]]].

Vicious Vengeance.description:
Prerequisites Antipaladin [Chaotic Evil] Cause

While your vengeance is painful for both you and your foe, none can doubt that your enemies suffer more. You gain a circumstance bonus to the damage you deal from Destructive Vengeance equal to the number of damage dice from the reaction. This only applies to the damage the enemy takes, not the damage to yourself or the extra damage you gain after using the reaction.

Vigilant Benediction.description:
Unwilling to be outdone by the Crimson Reclaimers and their oath, you've petitioned the gods of good for a sliver of divine magic. Choose one of the following deities whose requirements you meet-for the Any Deity option below, you can select a deity the GM deems appropriate-and one of the listed spells. You can Cast that Spell once per day as a 4th-level divine innate spell, and you become trained in divine spell DCs and divine spell attack rolls. At 14th level, the spell heightens to 5th level; at 16th level, the spell heightens to 6th level. Once you've selected a deity and a spell, you can't change this selection. You don't need to worship the deity as your patron deity, as they are willing to grant this boon on behalf of your worthy cause. You must refrain from performing your deity's anathema or lose the ability to cast this spell until you atone.

  • Any Deity: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tgIhRUFtgDSELpJE]{Spell Immunity}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HTou8cG05yuSkesj]{Status}
  • Gendowyn: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{Barkskin}
  • Iomedae: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YrzBLPLd3r9m6t1p]{Fire Shield}
  • Irori: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Stoneskin}
  • Kazutal: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mage Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Stoneskin}
  • Milani: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YrzBLPLd3r9m6t1p]{Fire Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mage Armor}
  • Ragathiel: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YrzBLPLd3r9m6t1p]{Fire Shield}
  • Sarenrae: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{Wall of Fire}

Special You can select this feat a second time at 14th level, gaining a second spell to cast once per day from your chosen deity's list or the Any Deity list, and you become an expert in divine spell DCs and divine spell attack rolls. You can select this feat a third time at 18th level. If you do, you gain a third spell to cast once per day from your chosen deity's list or the Any Deity list, and all three spells are heightened to 7th level.

Vivacious Bravado.description:
Requirements You gained Panache this turn.

Your ego swells, granting you a temporary reprieve from your pain. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Charisma modifier that last until the start of your next turn.

Voice Cold as Death.description:
Requirements You are not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

Channeling the energy of the Crimson Oath into your voice, you pronounce a threat in a tone so icy it freezes the blood. Attempt an Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize}; you don't suffer a penalty if the target doesn't understand the language you're speaking, but this otherwise functions as normal. You can't use Intimidating Glare or any other effect that would cause your Demoralize attempt to lose the auditory trait as part of using this feat. If you critically succeed at your Intimidation check, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Atordoado 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Atordoado 2} if the target is undead. After using this feat, you are fatigued until the end of your next turn, and you can't use this feat again until the end of your next turn.

Waking Dream.name: Waking Dream
Waking Dream.description: While in your trance, you can blur the line between dreams and reality for others. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OmhnoYOzFhrp6rXv]{Waking Dream} focus spell, which you can use only while you're in a Daydream Trance. You gain a pool of Focus Points with 1 Focus Point and you can Refocus by taking a nap for 10 minutes. You become trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs, and your spellcasting ability for these spells is Wisdom.

Wall Run.name: Correr na Parede
Wall Run.description: Você desafia a gravidade, atravessando planos verticais tão facilmente quanto o solo. Ande até sua Velocidade. Você deve iniciar seu movimento em uma superfície horizontal. Durante este movimento, você pode andar em superfícies verticais (como paredes) em sua Velocidade total. Se encerrar o movimento de Andar fora do chão, você cai após realizar sua próxima ação ou ao final de seu turno — o que ocorrer primeiro (embora você possa Segurar numa Beirada, se aplicável). Se possuir Passo na Água ou uma habilidade similar, Correr na Parede lhe permite correr por superfícies verticais

Wandering Thoughts.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements You used your most recent action to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}.

When your Psyche is Unleashed, each burst of magic you cast also folds space around you, and you travel through one of those folds. You teleport 15 feet to a square you can see.

Ward Against Corruption.description: Your soul is warded against the power of undeath and plague, as well as that of the evil former psychopomps known as sahkils. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against death effects, disease, and all effects from undead or sahkils. This bonus increases to +2 against an undead or sahkil’s death effect or disease.

Ward Slumber.description: Just before going to sleep, you can perform a 10-minute ward to protect the slumber of up to eight creatures within 30 feet of you. All creatures affected by the ritual gain a +4 status bonus on saving throws against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare}, a night hag's dream haunting, or other effects influencing dreams (such as those provided by this archetype) until your next daily preparations. They heal double the usual amount of Hit Points from resting.

Watchful Gaze.description:
You use your many eyes to look in all directions at once, making you extremely observant for a short period of time. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.9qV49KjZujZnSp6w]{All-Around Vision} until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.a7qiSYdlaIRPe57i]{Effect: Watchful Gaze}

Water Sprint.description:
Prerequisites master in Athletics

Experience and training have taught you that water has just enough surface tension for a master sprinter to traverse the surface.

When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride} in a straight line, if you move at least half your Speed over ground, you can move any amount of the remaining distance across a level body of water. If you don’t end your Stride on solid ground, you fall into the water.

If you’re legendary in Athletics, as long as you start on solid ground, any part of your Stride can cross the water’s surface, even if you aren’t moving a straight line, though you still fall into the water if you don’t end your movement on solid ground.

Water Step.name: Passo na Água
Water Step.description: Você pode Andar sobre líquidos e superfícies que não suportem seu peso. Este benefício dura somente durante seu movimento. Se encerrar seu movimento em uma superfície incapaz de suportá-lo, você cai ou ela colapsa normalmente.

Weapon-Rune Shifter.name: Alterador de Runas de Arma
Weapon-Rune Shifter.description:
Arquétipo Guarda dos Cristais

Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Guarda dos Cristais

Você aprende como alterar a magia das runas de armas usando um cristal como componente de foco. Uma vez por dia durante suas preparações diárias, você pode se concentrar nas energias mágicas de uma runa através das facetas de um cristal para alterar uma única runa de propriedade em uma arma em sua posse para suprimir seus efeitos normais e fazê-la funcionar como uma runa de propriedade diferente. Você pode alterar temporariamente a runa para funcionar como uma das seguintes runas: corrosiva, flamejante, congelante, toque fantasma, agravante, retornante, chocante, trovejante, ou sanguinária. A runa da propriedade permanece alterada até você fazer seus próximos preparativos diários. A arma deve atender aos pré-requisitos para a runa temporária, e quaisquer outras runas que requeiram a runa suprimida também serão suprimidas enquanto a runa é transformada. A runa está obviamente alterada e, portanto, a arma não pode ser vendida como se tivesse a runa temporária.

(Tradução não oficial - Age of Ashes livro 4)

Web Walker.description: You have plenty of practice navigating webs. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves and AC against the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9s5tqqXNzcoKamWx]{Web} spell, natural webbing, and effects that entrap you in webbing, as well as a +1 circumstance bonus against other effects that snare and entangle you, like the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangle} spell. Whenever you roll a success on a saving throw against an effect involving a web, you get a critical success instead.

Web Weaver.description:
You can produce a soft silk to weave into useful items. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Specialty Crafting} feat with a specialty in weaving.

You can use your webbing to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} simple, nonconsumable threaded items, such as clothing and rope, at zero cost as long as their base Price is 1 sp or less. These items have no resale value, and they naturally degrade after 24 hours without regular (if minor) maintenance. You can maintain up to 10 such items at a time; if you create a new one, your oldest creation breaks down from neglect.

These temporary items take you only 1 day to Craft instead of 4. If you're an expert in Crafting, you can Craft these items in 1 hour; if you're a master, you can Craft them in 10 minutes; if you're legendary, you can Craft them in 1 minute.

Weight of Guilt.name: Peso da Culpa
Weight of Guilt.description:
Pré-requisitos causa de redentor

A culpa anuvia a mente daqueles que ignoram seu Vislumbre de Redenção. Em vez de deixar a criatura acionadora enfraquecida 2, você pode deixá-la estupefata 2 pela mesma duração.

Well-Armed.description: Your detachable limbs offer flexibility. You Interact to remove your arm and wield it in the other one, increasing your reach by 5 feet for any one-handed weapon held in that arm. If your next action is a Strike with that weapon, creatures that were outside your reach that you can now hit are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against your first attack. You don't have a free hand while holding the arm. You can Interact to reattach the arm while holding it.

What Could Have Been.description: Rather than conjuring creatures from elsewhere in the world or the planes, you can temporarily pull a much different version of yourself from an alternate timeline-for instance, instead of summoning a generic or random troll with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.e9UJoVYUd5kJWUpi]{Summon Giant}, you summon a troll version of yourself from a timeline where you're a troll. If your next action is to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} that summons a creature, that creature is another version of you. This creature remains the type of creature you summoned and has largely the same abilities (plus the following adjustments), but it clearly resembles you, likely sharing some distinguishing features, such as mannerisms, speech patterns, tattoos, or clothing. The summoned creature gains a +1 status bonus to any skill check in which you're trained, a +2 status bonus if you're an expert, a +3 status bonus if you're a master, or a +4 status bonus if you're legendary. The creature also takes a -2 penalty to all skills in which you're untrained.

Wheedle and Jig.description: You make capering motions and silly sounds to captivate onlookers. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IihxWhRfpsBgQ5jS]{Enthrall} as a 3rd-level arcane innate spell once per day.

Whirlwind Stance.name: Postura do Redemoinho
Whirlwind Stance.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Acrobata do Cajado} Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Acrobata do Cajado, proficiência especialista em seu cajado Requirementos Você está empunhando seu cajado, que deve ter a traço de aparar.

Você usa seu cajado como um instrumento defensivo e ofensivo. Você ganha +2 de bônus de circunstância na CA, contanto que permaneça nessa posição.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse livro 1)

Whispering Steps.description:
Your spell leaves a lingering connection between you and a creature-one through which you can nudge the creature's mind this way or that. The amped cantrip must take 2 or more actions to cast, target one or more creatures, and either require a spell attack roll or have a saving throw. Use this amp in place of the psi cantrip's normal amp entry.

Amp Choose one enemy who is a target of the spell. If that enemy fails its save or the spell hits it, you whisper in the creature's mind, forcing it to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step} in a direction of your choosing; as this is forced movement, you can't force the creature to Step into hazardous terrain, off a ledge, or the like. After it Steps, the creature becomes temporarily immune to this amp for 24 hours.

Widen the Gap.name: Alargar o Fosso
Widen the Gap.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.VRUYc3QyRjjOjppc]{Lenhador Turpin Rowe}

Depois de penetrar nas defesas de um inimigo, você pode entrar no mesmo local para explorar a ferida do seu oponente e causar sérios danos. Na segunda vez que você acertar e causar dano com Golpe de machado corpo a corpo no mesmo oponente ou objeto durante o seu turno, você ignora metade da dureza do oponente ou do objeto, se houver. Se você acertar e causar dano com um Golpe de machado corpo a corpo no mesmo oponente ou objeto pela terceira ou quarta vez durante o seu turno, você ignorará toda a sua Dureza, se houver.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse livro 3)

Wind-Tossed Spell.description:
You enhance your spell with elemental air, using the wind to find your target and carry your magic around cover.

If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that requires a spell attack roll, you ignore the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition and any cover they have from you.

The spell gains the air trait.

Winding Flow.name: Fluidez Sinuosa
Winding Flow.description:
Frequência uma vez por rodada

Qualquer jornada é muito mais do que simplesmente alcançar o destino. Você usa duas das seguintes ações em qualquer ordem: Andar, Dar um Passo e Levantar. Você não pode usar a mesma ação duas vezes.

Wolf Drag.name: Arrasto do Lobo
Wolf Drag.description:
Pré-requisitos Postura do Lobo

Requirements Você está na Postura do Lobo

Você derruba seu inimigo. Faça um Golpe de mandíbula do lobo. Sua mandíbula do lobo adquire o traço fatal d12 para este Golpe, e se o ataque for bem-sucedido, você derruba o alvo prostrado.

Wolf in Sheep's Clothing.description: With a bit of hide, some antlers, and some cast-off fur, you can create a disguise that will fool even an experienced hunter. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} creatures with the animal, beast, or plant traits, so long as they are either the same size or one size larger than you and have a body shape that conforms at least vaguely to your own (in other words, a typical humanoid could Impersonate a bear or an arboreal, but not a horse, giant scorpion, or assassin vine). Impersonating a larger creature doesn't change your actual size.

Words of Unraveling.description: You have unlocked abstruse methods to tangle with reality itself, altering the fate of a single individual. Once per day as an occult innate spell, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dARE6VfJ3Uoq5M53]{Daydreamer's Curse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KSAEhNfZyXMO7Z7V]{Outcast's Curse}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.APDrC83QljsyHenB]{Savant's Curse}. At the GM's discretion, you can substitute or add additional occult curse spells of 4th level or lower to this list. You can choose a different spell from the list each time you use this ability. If you couldn't already cast occult spells, these spells use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells; if you could already cast occult spells, your proficiency in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells increases to expert.

Wounded Rage.name: Fúria Ferida
Wounded Rage.description:
Acionamento Você toma dano e está apto a entrar em fúria

Você dá um rugido de dor, despertando o furor dentro de você. Você entra em Fúria.

Wronged Monk's Wrath.name: Wronged Monk's Wrath
Wronged Monk's Wrath.description: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8TBgEzjZxPaOJOm1]{Wronged Monk's Wrath} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Zombie Dedication.description:
Despite your death and subsequent reanimation as a rotting corpse, you retain most of your mind and identity. Yet, it's always there: the hunger for the flesh and organs of the living. You gain the undead and zombie traits, and the basic undead benefits. Unlike a typical zombie, you're not mindless. Reduce all your Speeds by 5 feet. Your fist loses the nonlethal trait.

Because of its progressing state of decay, your body requires continual maintenance to remain at its best. Each day after your rest period, your body is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.94MzLpLykQIWKcA1]{Deteriorated} due to natural decay. Additionally, some zombie abilities allow you to push for a greater effect in exchange for a chance of deteriorating your body.

While your body is deteriorated, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. You can spend 10 minutes checking and repairing your joints and other weak parts of your body to recover from deterioration. You can perform these repairs as part of your daily preparations. Because it's a natural result of your body's functions, you can't remove the slowed condition from deterioration through any other means.

You crave the flesh of the living. You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage. Your jaws are in the brawling group and have the unarmed trait. You can use your jaws Strike only against a creature that's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by you.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.G38usCLuTDmFYw7V]{Zombie} archetype.
